00033 #define mrDistances_h

00040 BEGIN_NAMESPACE( mr )

00042 BEGIN_NAMESPACE( distances )
00043 
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 
00048 struct Type
00049 {
00050   virtual miScalar operator()( const vector& d ) const = 0;
00051   virtual miScalar operator()( const vector& d, const vector& s ) const = 0;
00052 };
00053 
00055 struct Euclidian : public Type
00056 {
00057   miScalar operator()( const vector& d ) const
00058   {
00059      return d.x * d.x + d.y * d.y + d.z * d.z;
00060   }
00061   miScalar operator()( const vector& d, const vector& s ) const
00062   {
00063      return s.x*d.x*d.x + s.y*d.y*d.y + s.z*d.z*d.z;
00064   }
00065 };
00066 
00068 struct Manhattan : public Type
00069 {
00070   miScalar operator()( const vector& d ) const
00071   {
00072      return ( math<float>::fabs(d.x) +
00073               math<float>::fabs(d.y) +
00074               math<float>::fabs(d.z) );
00075   }
00076   miScalar operator()( const vector& d, const vector& s ) const
00077   {
00078      return ( math<float>::fabs(d.x * s.x) +
00079               math<float>::fabs(d.y * s.y) +
00080               math<float>::fabs(d.z * s.z) );
00081   }
00082 };
00083 
00085 struct Chessboard : public Type
00086 {
00087   miScalar operator()( const vector& d ) const
00088   {
00089      return max( math<float>::fabs(d.x),
00090                  math<float>::fabs(d.y),
00091                  math<float>::fabs(d.z) );
00092   }
00093   miScalar operator()( const vector& d, const vector& s ) const
00094   {
00095      return max( math<float>::fabs(d.x * s.x),
00096                  math<float>::fabs(d.y * s.y),
00097                  math<float>::fabs(d.z * s.z) );
00098   }
00099 };

00111 
00113 struct Superquadratic : public Type
00114 {
00115   miScalar operator()( const vector& d ) const
00116   {
00117      return ( math<float>::pow( math<float>::fabs(d.x), 2.0f ) +
00118               math<float>::pow( math<float>::fabs(d.y), 2.0f ) +
00119               math<float>::pow( math<float>::fabs(d.z), 2.0f ) );
00120   }
00121      
00122   miScalar operator()( const vector& d, const vector& s ) const
00123   {
00124      return ( math<float>::pow( math<float>::fabs(d.x), s.x ) +
00125               math<float>::pow( math<float>::fabs(d.y), s.y ) +
00126               math<float>::pow( math<float>::fabs(d.z), s.z ) );
00127   }
00128 };
